summary: Very simple tweak/mod to the 3rd-person camera. Can\'t imagine it would conflict with anything UNLESS it is something related to the camera settings.
descriptionHtml:
For those unsure of what this does:

The following tweaks simply change the position of the camera in 3rd-person view. The file itself actually does nothing, it merely tells you how to do it :)

----------

Very simple tweak/mod to the 3rd-person camera. Can\'t imagine it would conflict with anything UNLESS it is something related to the camera settings.

The downloadable file contains this info in a text document with some example screenshots.

----------

Just open up your \"Skyrim.ini\" file, located in:
(My Documents/Documents)\\My Games\\Skyrim

Then simply copy and paste the following to the bottom of the file and save it (shouldn\'t cause any problems, but you never know, so back up your \"Skyrim.ini\" file first):

[Camera]
fOverShoulderCombatAddY=-25.0000
fOverShoulderCombatPosZ=15.0000
fOverShoulderCombatPosX=15.0000
fOverShoulderPosZ=-10.0000
fOverShoulderPosX=-30.0000

----------

If it doesn\'t seem to do anything, open the in-game command console by pressing \"`\" (called the \"tilde\" key, located at the very top left of your keyboard, next to \"1\" and below \"esc\") and type (without the quotes!):

\"refini\"

Then press enter. This will force the game to reload all the ini perameters.

----------

You can change the camera settings to your own taste if you dont like the ones I came up with! The perameters are basically just coordinates relative to the middle of your character\'s head.

z = up and down, positive values are up, negative are down.

x = left and right, positive values are left, negative are right.

y = \"zoom\", positive values \"zoom in\", negative values \"zoom out\". Note: this IS NOT the in-game camera zooming, but something else.
author: Demidekidasu
